title: Life Expectancy at Birth, Total for Countries with Fragile and Conflict Affected Situations
notes:
Life expectancy at birth indicates the number of years a newborn infant would live if prevailing patterns of mortality at the time of its birth were to stay the same throughout its life.

Nations that are included in this data series are listed at http://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/fragilityconflictviolence/overview

Source Indicator: SP.DYN.LE00.IN
